revised_title: Multenions and Differential Invariants: A Summary of Properties and Applications
tldr: The author presents a summary of multenions, a mathematical tool used to deal with differential invariants and relativity. They discuss the properties of multenions, including their algebraic structure, vector complexes, and various types of linities. The author also explains how multenions can be applied to differential invariants and highlights their importance in understanding complex mathematical concepts.
